rules:
    components-parameters-prefix-in-cookie:
        description: Parameters should be in a location matching the prefix (Cookie.)
        message: {{value}} does not match the parameter prefix. {{description}}. Fix by assigning the correct in value, eg. header -> cookie.
        given: $.components.parameters..[?(@property.match(/^Cookie\./))]
        severity: error
        then:
            field: in
            function: pattern
            functionOptions:
                match: ^cookie$
